Music Alley is a company with new, innovative ideas and old-fashioned quality and dependable service. We offer personalized service with your best interest in mind. We opened up in 1974 as a small, family run business and have grown steadily with our “family” of customers.  We still have the small store feel and ideals, but with all the professional product lines that you want.  Unlike the large chain stores that have different sales people every other month, most of our staff has been with us for more than 20 years!  You will feel like part of the family when you deal with us, not like a stranger every time you walk in.  Music Alley offers a full service repair shop to handle all of your repair needs…. guitars, amps, speakers, keyboards, electronics and more.  We also specialize in sound system installations and have installed systems in many of Alabama’s schools, clubs and religious organizations.

We give you the personal service you'd expect from a small company and the products and capabilities you'd expect from a much larger one. Our responsiveness, training, and quality technicians make Midwest Systems & Services, Inc. stand out from our competition. We have successfully been installing and maintaining our equipment and technology for more than 25 years. You can trust our expertise and experience.
Sound, Lighting, & Video - Sales, Install, Rental, & Service Over 30 year in the business!!

Autry Electronics is a family owned and operated electronics integration company. Our business has served theareas from Mt. Brook to Lake Martinfrom our Chelsea location since 1976. Autry Electronics offers consultation, design, installation and after the sale support for all your audio / visual integration needs. We offer solutions based on your needs and budget designed to enhance the enjoyment, comfort, security and energy efficiency of your home.
Specializing In Car Audio, Window Tinting, Custom Wheels, Alarms, And More. Financing Available.

You deserve the best for you and your guest at your event or  your celebration. JR Live Lighting Event Design can provide you with the best results you deserve. Our Event Design services can bring you new and creative ideas to any function. From Galas, weddings, schools, private and corporate function and parties. We bring the best to any style event.
Background Music for Business, Messaging on Hold, and Custom solutions for acoustics, sound, and video for business.

Music Alley is a company with new, innovative ideas and old-fashioned quality and dependable service. We offer personalized service with your best interest in mind. We opened up in 1974 as a small, family run business and have grown steadily with our “family” of customers.  We still have the small store feel and ideals, but with all the professional product lines that you want.  Unlike the large chain stores that have different sales people every other month, most of our staff has been with us for more than 20 years!  You will feel like part of the family when you deal with us, not like a stranger every time you walk in.  Music Alley offers a full service repair shop to handle all of your repair needs…. guitars, amps, speakers, keyboards, electronics and more.  We also specialize in sound system installations and have installed systems in many of Alabama’s schools, clubs and religious organizations.
